channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Watch the New Trailer for Bruce Springsteen Movie Deliver Me From Nowhere
item.description: 🎸 Get ready to rock with The Boss! 🎥 Watch the trailer for Bruce Springsteen's new movie, Deliver Me From Nowhere. 🎬 #Springsteen #MusicMovieMagic

item.title: Travis Kelce Says ‘There Were a Few Tears’ When He Proposed to Taylor Swift: ‘I’m an Emotional Guy’
item.description: Looks like Travis Kelce is as emotional as we are listening to Taylor Swift! 😭❤️ Who else needs a tissue? #EmotionalGuy #MusicNews

item.title: Blancmange Keyboardist Stephen Luscombe Has Died
item.description: RIP to Stephen Luscombe, the keyboard wizard from Blancmange 🎹🌟 Let's celebrate his incredible musical legacy together! 🎶 #StephenLuscombe #BlancmangeForever

item.title: Foo Fighters Play First Show in Over a Year, Unveil New Drummer Ilan Rubin: Video + Setlist
item.description: The Foos are back with a bang! 🥁🎸 Check out their epic comeback show highlights and get ready to rock! 🤘 #FooFighters #LiveMusicJoy

item.title: Sleep Token To Launch Fall 2025 US Arena Tour
item.description: Who's ready for an epic journey with @SleepToken? 🎸✨ Get ready to rock your socks off! #SleepTokenTour2025 🎶🔥
